data.text:
Arriving at the Address Grand Greek reminds me of arriving home, I really love how the "Address Hotels" have this fabulous smell when you walk in. We arrived late and were promptly checked in and taken to the room which had all the amenities you would expect at a 5 Star hotel. I love all the little branded packages just in case you have forgotten to pack a toothbrush it is there. I love the water, coffee and little biscuits. 

Breakfast had beautiful baked goods, sweet treats and wholesome cooked food all nice and warm serviced with light fluffy coffees and a selection of high end teas. 

I loved the pool, the view was great with nice background vibes, comfortable seats and lots of fresh water. Service from the bar was attentive and friendly with a great restaurant situated next door, where we enjoyed a scrumptious lunch. 

My husband left his ipad upon check out they promptly emailed and went through security to make sure they were giving it back to the correct person. Very thankful for this. 

We were very lucky to get to enjoy the most beautiful club lounge which had a great selection of hot and cold food with fabulous mini deserts and the view of downtown dubai was absolutely breathtaking. 

I would highly recommend the Address Grand Creek Dubai as the service from  Anastasia Kadatsenka and the team was exceptional. Thank you for looking after us and setting the standards for a super holiday. Hope to see you again really soon!
data.title: Epic Views From A Super Hotel

data.text:
Their iftar was awesome.. foods were delicious. Staffs were friendly and accommodating!

I’d like to recommend the place.. must visit! 😘

The location is far from the city but it is worth it to go! The views are instagramable!

Kudos to the team behind their Iftar!
data.title: Iftar 2024

data.text: This is the perfect hotel to stay in Dubai the staffs are so friendly and the service is the best quality and we had the best house keeping mr NAY PAING thank you so much for making our stay comfortable I hope I will be back soon it was the most amazing and unforgettable moment
data.title: Perfection

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear FarAway38299042133,

Thank you for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you found our hotel to be perfect for your stay in Dubai. It's wonderful to know that our staff were friendly and provided you with the best quality service. We'll be sure to pass on your appreciation to Nay and the housekeeping team for ensuring your stay was comfortable.

We're delighted that your stay with us was amazing and unforgettable. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon for another wonderful experience. 

Warm regards,
Emine
Management Office
owner_response.author: Emine Breytenbach

data.text: It is the best hotel i have ever been to. The stuff are so friendly and the service is the best and we also had the best house keeping in the hotel shoutout to Mr. Nay paing. Thank you so much for the amazing hospitality i hope we will be back soon...
data.title: Perfection

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 987fevene,

Thank you for your wonderful feedback! It is amazing to hear that your experience at our hotel was nothing short of perfection. It's fantastic to know that you found our staff to be friendly and that you received the best service during your stay.

We'll be sure to pass on your appreciation to Mr. Nay Paing and the entire housekeeping team for their outstanding service. Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we're delighted that you had an amazing hospitality experience.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another fantastic stay.

Warm regards,
Emine
Management Office
owner_response.author: Emine Breytenbach

data.text:
Excellent new hotel, amazing view , very nice rooms.
Friendly staff and very polite.
In particular I’d like to thank the housekeeping staff, they did a great job . Arshadul and his assistant Loshan did very professional and nice job 👍.
In general we had a very nice stay
data.title: Excellent stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Kosai01,

Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you had an excellent stay at our hotel and that you enjoyed the amazing view and nice rooms. We're also pleased to hear that our staff, especially Arshadul and Loshan from housekeeping, provided you with friendly and professional service.

Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we'll be sure to pass on your appreciation to the entire team. We're delighted that you had a very nice stay overall.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another fantastic experience.

Warm regards,
Emine
Management Office
